FindingName: Suspicious Outgoing Spam Messages Not Monitored
Description: The Outbound Spam Policy allows for admins to be sent copies of suspected/suspicious outbound messages that may be spam. This configuration can be used to detect and alert administrators to potentially compromised or abused accounts.
Remediation:
This setting is most easily accessible via the Set-HostedOutboundSpamFilterPolicy function in the Exchange Online PowerShell module. Use the Set-HostedOutboundSpamFilterPolicy function as follows:
Set-HostedOutboundSpamFilterPolicy -BccSuspiciousOutboundMail $true -BccSuspiciousOutboundAdditionalRecipients "administrator@yourdomain"

References.Text: Configure Outbound Spam Notification Office 365 Exchange Online
